parts.text:
Here's a list of the Cookie API endpoints, categorized for clarity.  Note that some endpoints may require authentication (API Key) and/or specific request methods (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE).  Always refer to the full documentation for the most up-to-date information on parameters, request methods, and authentication requirements for each endpoint.


**I. AI Endpoints:**

* `/api/ai/message`:  Generates a response from a chat AI (GET).
* `/api/ai/generate-image`: Generates an image using AI (POST).
* `/api/ai/translate`: Translates text to any language (POST).
* `/api/ai/uwufy`:  Converts text to UwU format (POST).


**II. Tools Endpoints:**

* `/api/color/color-converter`: Converts between HEX and RGB color codes (GET).
* `/api/tools/validate-hex-color`: Validates a HEX color code (GET).
* `/api/tools/random-color`: Generates a random HEX and RGB color (GET).
* `/api/tools/echo`: Echoes the received request (Any Method).
* `/api/tools/generate-string`: Generates a random string with customizable parameters (GET).
* `/api/tools/magic-8-ball`:  Provides a Magic 8 Ball response (GET).


**III. Discord Endpoints:**

* `/api/discord/bot`: Gets information about a Discord bot (POST).
* `/api/discord/guilds`: Gets information about all guilds a bot is in (POST).
* `/api/discord/guild`: Gets information about a specific guild a bot is in (POST).
* `/api/discord/get-role-members`: Gets members with a specific role in a guild (GET).
* `/api/discord/sendfile`: Sends files to a Discord channel (POST).
* `/api/discord/oauth2/add`: Adds a Discord OAuth2 application (POST).
* `/api/discord/oauth2/applications/list`: Lists registered Discord OAuth2 applications (GET).
* `/api/discord/oauth2/applications/delete`: Deletes a Discord OAuth2 application (DELETE).
* `/api/discord/oauth2/users/list`: Lists verified Discord users (GET).
* `/api/discord/oauth2/users/delete`: Deletes a verified Discord user (DELETE).
* `/api/discord/user-info`: Gets information about a Discord user in a server (GET).


**IV.  Transcript Endpoints:**

* `/api/transcript`: Creates or modifies a transcript (POST).  (V1)
* `/api/transcript/download`: Downloads a transcript as an HTML file (GET).  (V1)
* `/api/transcript/v1-mini`: Creates a simple text transcript and sends it to Discord (POST). (V1-mini)
* `/api/transcript/v1-mini`: Creates a simple text transcript and sends it to Discord (POST). (V1-mini)


**V. Roblox Endpoints:**

* `/api/roblox/asset-downloader`: Downloads a Roblox asset and its information (GET).
* `/api/roblox/user`: Gets information about a Roblox user (GET).
* `/api/roblox/gamepass/change-price`: Changes the price of a Roblox game pass (PATCH).
* `/api/roblox/assets/change-price`: Changes the price of a Roblox asset (PATCH).
* `/api/roblox/group/group-sales`: Lists recent group sales (GET).
* `/api/roblox/join-group`: Joins a Roblox group (POST).
* `/api/roblox/leave-group`: Leaves a Roblox group (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/group/audit-log`: Lists the Roblox group audit log (GET).
* `/api/roblox/group/shout`: Makes a group shout (PATCH).
* `/api/roblox/group/relationship/requests`: Lists pending group relationship requests (GET).
* `/api/roblox/group/relationship/accept`: Accepts a group relationship request (POST).
* `/api/roblox/group/relationship/deny`: Denies a group relationship request (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/group/relationship/delete`: Deletes a group relationship (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/group/join-requests/list`: Lists join requests for a group (GET).
* `/api/roblox/group/join-requests/accept`: Accepts a user's group join request (POST).
* `/api/roblox/group/join-requests/deny`: Denies a user's group join request (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/group/edit-role`: Edits a user's role in a group (PATCH).
* `/api/roblox/group/kick`: Kicks a user from a group (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/group/ban`: Bans a user from a group (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/group/unban`: Unbans a user from a group (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/oauth2/add`: Adds a Roblox OAuth2 application (POST).
* `/api/roblox/oauth2/applications/list`: Lists registered Roblox OAuth2 applications (GET).
* `/api/roblox/oauth2/applications/delete`: Deletes a Roblox OAuth2 application (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/oauth2/users/list`: Lists verified Roblox users (GET).
* `/api/roblox/oauth2/users/delete`: Deletes a verified Roblox user (DELETE).
* `/api/roblox/verification/add`: Adds a Roblox user to the verification database (GET).
* `/api/roblox/verification/delete`: Deletes a Roblox user from the verification database (GET).
* `/api/roblox/verification/deleteallpending`: Deletes all pending Roblox users from the database (GET).
* `/api/roblox/verification/findpending`: Finds pending Roblox users in the database (GET).
* `/api/roblox/verification/find`: Finds verified Roblox users in the database (GET).
* `/api/roblox/verification/verify`: Verifies a Roblox user (GET).


**VI. BotGhost & BotWiz Endpoints:**

* `/api/botghost/tally-submissions`: Processes Tally.so submissions for BotGhost (POST).
* `/api/botghost/webhook-unlocker`: Unlocks BotGhost webhooks (Any Method).
* `/api/botwiz/tally-submissions`: Processes Tally.so submissions for BotWiz (POST).  (Deprecated)


**VII. Email Endpoints:**

* `/api/email/email-verification`: Sends a verification email (POST).
* `/api/email/trash-mail-identifier`: Identifies trash email addresses (GET).


**VIII. Time Endpoints:**

* `/api/time/country-to-time`: Gets the current time in a specific country (GET).
* `/api/time/current-time`: Gets the current time in various formats and time zones (GET).
* `/api/time/timestamp`: Converts human-readable time to UNIX and ISO timestamps (GET).
* `/api/time/time-difference`: Calculates the difference between two timestamps (GET).


**IX.  API Information Endpoints:**

* `/api/status`: Returns the API status (GET).
* `/api/api-key`: Returns information about an API key (GET).


**X. Cooldown Endpoints:**

* `/api/cooldown/create`: Creates a cooldown (POST).
* `/api/cooldown/get-cooldown`: Gets a specific cooldown (GET).
* `/api/cooldown/list`: Gets all cooldowns (GET).
* `/api/cooldown/delete`: Deletes a cooldown (DELETE).


**XI. Dynamic URL Endpoints:**

* `/api/dynamic-url/create`: Creates a dynamic URL (POST).
* `/api/dynamic-url/modify`: Modifies a dynamic URL (POST).
* `/api/dynamic-url/view`: Views information about a dynamic URL (GET).
* `/api/dynamic-url/delete`: Deletes a dynamic URL (DELETE).


Remember to replace placeholders like `<API Key>`, `<Bot ID>`, `<Webhook ID>`, etc., with your actual values.  Always consult the Cookie API documentation for detailed explanations and examples for each endpoint.
